content: Unifi sucks la even my mobile data is better than this shit Unifi. I dont know if they're producing cancer to people or just sit there and relax do nothing. Idk what the owner of TM is doing so useless. I'm playing csgo and my ping goes up to 1000+ update need 2hr+ but if i use my mobile data,only need 4 min.YES UNIFI SUCKS LIKE HELL.UNIFI PRODUCE WIFI CANCER
